description: First floor side extensions, Two storey rear extension,  Alterations to garage roof to create pitched roof, Single storey attached outbuilding at side for use as plant/boiler room, Alterations to roof to form rear dormer, Roof lights in front and rear roof slopes, External alterations (Demolition of attached outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>PR24-087a - Existing Ground Floor Plans; PR24-087b - Existing First Floor Plans; PR24-087c - Existing Roof Plans; PR24-087d - Existing Front and Rear Elevations;&nbsp; PR24-087e - Existing Side Elevations and Section Details; PR24-087e [sic] – Proposed Ground Floor Plan; PR24-087g– Proposed First Floor Plan PR24-087h– Proposed Loft Plan; PR24-087i– Proposed Roof Plan; PR24-087j– Proposed Front and Rear Elevations; PR24-087k – Proposed Side Elevations and Section Details; PR24-087l – Site Location Map; Fire Safety – Reasonable Exception Statement</p><p>All plans received and valid 10.12.24</p>

<p>Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the first floor and above side elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
